vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway1.redeem (patch_4.sol#14-19) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_4.sol#16)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_4.sol#17)

external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_4.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway1.Command (patch_4.sol#26-29):
	-require(bool)(adr.call.value(msg.value)(data)) patch_4.sol#28
